title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 31.2 - Doing business with unlicensed solicitors prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 31.2 - Doing business with unlicensed solicitors prohibited

State Regulations

No manufacturer or wholesaler shall receive, accept or
fill any order for the sale of any alcoholic beverage, which shall have been
solicited by a person who is not the holder of a solicitor's permit authorizing
the permittee to represent such manufacturer or wholesaler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
31.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
